subdisciplines.name: Cinematography
subdisciplines.description: The art and technique of capturing visual images on camera.

subdisciplines.name: Film Editing
subdisciplines.description: The art and technique of film editing, including selecting shots, trimming footage, and providing transitions.

subdisciplines.name: Sound Design
subdisciplines.description: The art and technique of creating and manipulating sound effects and music for film.

subdisciplines.name: Screenwriting
subdisciplines.description: The art and technique of writing a screenplay for film or television.
